summary: This is the daily lieutenant's log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, for August 9, 2019. It details routine prison operations, counts, inmate movements, and security checks across three shifts (Morning, Day, and Evening Watch). The log notes an inmate on suicide watch with a companion and another inmate on a dry cell watch, but does not mention Jeffrey Epstein by name.

persons.name: Jones

events.title: Daily Prison Operations and Inmate Movements
events.description: Routine prison operations at MCC New York including inmate counts, security checks, body alarm tests, and multiple inmate transfers, releases, and hospital movements.

events.title: Inmate Placed on Dry Cell Watch
events.description: Inmate Fernandez (86824-054) was placed on a dry cell with staff watch in R&D.

events.title: Inmate Taken Off Suicide Watch
events.description: An unspecified inmate was taken off suicide watch at 1:10 PM.

events.title: Institutional Lockdown for Court
events.description: The institution was locked down at 3:45 PM for court proceedings.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: This is a routine prison operations log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for August 9, 2019.
The log documents inmate counts, security procedures, and movements but does not contain any explicit mention of Jeffrey Epstein or events directly related to his case.
One inmate (Fernandez) was placed on a dry cell watch with staff supervision.
The log notes an inmate was on suicide watch with a companion, and another was taken off suicide watch during the day shift.
The institution was locked down in the afternoon for court proceedings.
